glsa.title: Mgetty: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: Mgetty uses temporary files in an insecure manner, allowing for symlink attacks.

background.p: Mgetty is a set of fax and voice modem programs.

description.p: Dmitry E. Oboukhov reported that the "spooldir" directory in fax/faxspool.in is created in an insecure manner.

impact.p: A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Mgetty users should upgrade to the latest version:
